entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Melita
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:22 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -24.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Melita 07:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -24.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 71 %

Wind: NNW 41 km/h gust 52 km/h

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Local blowing snow this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022
